data.name: Age of seas
data.short_description: Space Thieves embarks you on a stellar mission to collect materials through an open world universe, meet the requirements of the demand, create your transport routes and beware of space thieves, many wait to get quick money, since transporting the loads by space can be very dangerous at times.
data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Reference video game magazine in Spain”
10 – HobbyConsolas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (solo versiones de 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2400s @ 2.5 GHz AMD FX-6350 @ 3.9 GHz o equivalente
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660, AMD R9 270 (2048 MB VRAM con Shader Model 5.0 o superior)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: standar
  • Additional Notes: standar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (solo versiones de 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: standar
  • Additional Notes: standar
